Arihant Complex Numbers.q:
Express in the form \( A+i B \) :
(i) \( \frac{(a+i)^{2}}{(a-i)}-\frac{(a-i)^{2}}{(a+i)} \)
(ii) \( \left(\frac{1+\sin \alpha+i \cos \alpha}{1+\sin \alpha-i \cos \alpha}\right)^{n} \)
(iii) \( \left(\frac{1+2 i}{1+i}\right)^{n} \) for \( n=\pm 1, \pm 2, \pm 3, \pm 4, \)
(iv) \( \log _{e}(1+i \tan \alpha) \)

Express in the modulus-amplitude form :
(i) \( 1-i \)
(ii) \( \frac{(\sqrt{3}-1)+i(\sqrt{3}+1)}{2 \sqrt{2}} \)
(iii) \( \frac{(1+i)^{2 n+1}}{(1-i)^{2 n-1}}, n \in N \)
(iv) \( 1+i \tan \theta(-\pi< \theta< \pi, \theta \neq \pm \pi / 2) \)

(i) \( -i \)
(ii) \( -7-24 i \)
(iii) \( x+\sqrt{\left(-x^{4}-x^{2}-1\right)} \)
(iv) \( \left(\frac{a}{b}\right)^{2}+\left(\frac{b}{a}\right)^{2}-\frac{4}{i}\left(\frac{a}{b}-\frac{b}{a}\right)-6 \)

(i) \( \quad(1-i)^{n}=2^{n} \)
(ii) \( (1+i)^{n}=(1-i)^{n} \)

If \( i z^{3}+z^{2}-z+i=0, \) then show that \( |z|=1 \)
Prove that the complex numbers \( z_{1}, z_{2} \) and the origin form an equilateral triangle if and only if \( \frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}+\frac{z_{2}}{z_{1}}=1 \)

If \( |z|=1, \) then prove that
\[

\]

\[

\]

\]

\]

\]
